Playing

The aim of the game is to find all the gold with the fewest scans. Pressing a rock will either show a number, which is the number of gold bars that can be found in that rock's row and/or column, or will reveal a gold bar. Pressing an already found gold bar will do a scan.

Options

In the options menu the number of rows and columns in the game and the number of gold bars present can be changed.
